t1.quote: Thanks to Inquiro Forms, we gained a deep understanding of why users were dropping out of our registration process. The AI analysis revealed patterns we had completely overlooked.
t1.author: Camila Rojas

t2.quote: What impressed me most was the speed of the analysis. Within minutes, we had a report with charts, trends, and an AI summary that helped us steer our campaign.
t2.author: Mariano Díaz

t3.quote: We used to have data scattered across spreadsheets. Now, with Inquiro Forms, we export everything to CSV and get automatic summaries that simplify our management meetings.
t3.author: Sofía Navarro

t4.quote: AI helped us uncover the root causes behind our low customer satisfaction. Based on those insights, we redesigned our service and improved key metrics by 30%.
t4.author: Leandro Gómez

t5.quote: The platform allowed us to validate hypotheses quickly. We designed the survey, analysed responses with AI, and within hours had solid conclusions ready for the team.
t5.author: Ernesto Morales

t6.quote: We used Inquiro Forms for an internal workplace climate study. The AI analysis revealed critical points we were able to address before they escalated. A key tool.
t6.author: Tomás Herrera
